name: RetrieveCandidateFileUrl
description:
Retrieve the URL of a candidate's associated file.

Use this tool to retrieve the URL of a file linked to a specific candidate. Ensure you have the required 'candidatesRead' permission. Note that using Ashby demo data may cause errors; create a test candidate for testing.

parameters.name: candidate_file_handle
parameters.description: The file handle string retrieved from the public API, used to identify and access the candidate's associated file.

fileHandle.description: A file handle retrieved from the public API
